Name: Apostasy
About the game: The Shadow Temple has been invaded by masked horrors from its depths. The other Temples have answered a call for aid. A powerful entity that calls herself Umbra has seized control of the Temple. FEATURES: -Five playable characters! -Each character has a unique fighting style and movelist! -Each movelist consists of 15-18 unique attacks! -Interact with NPCs through dialogue trees, be nice, rude, or neutral! -Collect artifacts that give your character various stat buffs! -Timed attacks that activate when properly executing an input during a small timing window! -Combo system that allows you to fight enemies with tactics! -Each character has different health, move speed, range, etc! -Mana system used for special attacks/abilities! -Unnecessarily thick playable characters! -10-20 hours of gameplay with replay value! -14 levels and 4 boss levels!
Meta Title: Apostasy: Jun 21, 2018, Damnskulls and Full Overview
